Ideal cityescape.ph landing page, can't wait to get this release.

Reason behind for this project?

This is the first project project where I was able to use the tools listed below. With that said, I challenge my self creating a simple template for my cityescape.ph website. In fact, after this project, I will create a WordPress theme out of these .html templates.

Dig and Whois Tools

Reason behind for this project?

I find it time consuming if I query both DNS and Whois records in each separate designated websites. For example, for whois records, I have to check Whois and for the Dig result, I have to check Dig Result With that said, I have this tool which we can query both.
